title: Why Fears of a Trillion-Dollar AI Bubble Are Growing
description: Investors have parted with unprecedented sums of money to help AI fulfil its lofty promise. But no one really knows how it will all pay off

title: German Army to Tap Anti-Drone Startup Tytan for Air Defense: FAS
description: The German army is set to tap local defense startup Tytan Technologies to help it build a shield against drone attacks, Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung reported.

title: The Big AI Trade in Europe Is All About Data Centers and Power
description: As the artificial intelligence frenzy drives global equities to record highs, in Europe the momentum is flowing into industries critical to powering the technology.
